/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/c++ -g -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/colorful_triangle.dir/main_02.cpp.o CMakeFiles/colorful_triangle.dir/glad_APPLE.c.o CMakeFiles/colorful_triangle.dir/shader.cpp.o -o colorful_triangle   -L/usr/local/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib -framework Cocoa -framework OpenGL -framework IOKit -framework CoreVideo -lglfw3
